data.text: @SenThomTillis Pass the SAVE ACT! Without it, we lose our country all-together. Nothing else is more important right now!
@SenThomTillis Why the hell are you opposed to only US citizens voting??? Support the SAVE Act....
@SenThomTillis Why do you hate America so much that you can’t support the SAVE ACT!!!! Your vote matters to LEGAL AMERICAN citizens

@SenThomTillis Pass the save act- your ridiculous Olympic post is infuriating, not endearing. The people want the Save Act! I am highly suspicious of you… Should Nick Shirley visit your State? How compromised are you? https://t.co/mM0ZmyJGlN

@SenThomTillis Just found out you’ve been a rigid of Trump yr whole time in office. And that you allow brutal animal experimentations and medical animal research scams in N Carolina. You’re a fraud!  @HouseGOP  We want a new candidate to take this guy’s place. @SenateGOP @JudiciaryGOP
@SenThomTillis Quit being a road block to the SAVE act!!! Pass the SAVE act now. There's no excuse, unless you're a corrupt politician, to block it.

@SenThomTillis Vote Yes for the Save America Act!!! I am a NC resident, Do your damn job!! This is why we voted @POTUS into office!! We show our ID's for everything and voting shouldn't be different. We need free fair elections. @SenThomTillis
@SenThomTillis Stop the fraud, and pass the SAVE Act! We need you!
